channel.title: Consciousness on Silence Speaks
channel.description: Recent content in Consciousness on Silence Speaks

item.title: Daydreaming Thomas
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: I sort of spaced out Into an ethereal dream While she fell back Into her usual routine Of noticing Amidst the material That Which my eyes have never seen. She ponders for a bit in confusion The possible reasons for my doubt, But it's the subject of possibility The inexplicable mind can't figure out As I soar above the tops of buildings And dive into the Atlantic ocean With uncanny buoyancy I believed As just another preconceived notion Until I cast that fact Into the back Of the recycle bin After I break The REM cycle And consciousness clocks back in.
